docs.snippet: Perhaps thinking of another time and another place, the New York Skyliners and the Houston Stars played a magnificent game last night as they ended their brief United Soccer Association season at Yankee Stadium.
docs.lead_paragraph: Perhaps thinking of another time and another place, the New York Skyliners and the Houston Stars played a magnificent game last night as they ended their brief United Soccer Association season at Yankee Stadium.

headline.main: Skyliner and Stars Play to 2-2 Tie Here in Final Game of Their Season; 7,102 FANS WATCH OUTSTANDING PLAY Skyliners Rally in 2d Half After Aladin's Two Goals Give Stars 2-0 Lead

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, July 8 Circumstantial evidence is piling up that Maj. Ernesto Che Guevara, the guerrilla warfare theorist, is alive, probably somewhere on the South American continent.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, July 8 Circumstantial evidence is piling up that Maj. Ernesto Che Guevara, the guerrilla warfare theorist, is alive, probably somewhere on the South American continent.
docs.abstract: circumstantial evidence and speculation that Guevara directs guerrillas discussed; Gen Ovando's 'evidence' noted

headline.main: Growing Evidence Puts Guevara in South America; Bolivian General Believes Guerrilla Leader May Be Training Rebels Now

byline.original: By BARNARD L. COLLIER Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: NORTH AMERICA'S major stamp show in 1968 will be the in  ternational exhibition to be staged in Mexico City starting on Oct. 30, three days after the close of the XIX Olympiad in that capital.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay Want to break the routine of  air travel and also save money? If you happen to be on the east coast of  South America, take the overnight ship between Montevideo and Buenos Aires.

headline.main: The Night Boat From Uruguay to Argentina

docs.snippet: The superliner United States has been scheduled for its longest winter cruise and one that will take the 52,000-ton vessel across the Equator for the first time.
docs.lead_paragraph: The superliner United States has been scheduled for its longest winter cruise and one that will take the 52,000-ton vessel across the Equator for the first time.

headline.main: CRUISE CALENDAR GROWING LONGER; United States and Italian Lines Plan 28-Day Trips

docs.snippet: SANTIAGO, Chile, July 12-- United States diplomats are watching the preparations of far-leftist groups throughout the hemisphere in advance of the first meeting of the LatinAmerican Solidarity Organization, scheduled for July 28 in Havana.
docs.lead_paragraph: SANTIAGO, Chile, July 12-- United States diplomats are watching the preparations of far-leftist groups throughout the hemisphere in advance of the first meeting of the LatinAmerican Solidarity Organization, scheduled for July 28 in Havana.
docs.abstract: US concerned that coming Havana meeting of Latin-Amer Solidarity Orgn may produce coordinated drive to start more Latin-Amer guerrilla operations; clash expected between conservative, pro-USSR Communist party orgns and radical factions that would stir violent rebellion; Castro role in founding orgn to promote latter group noted

headline.main: New Latin Guerrilla Drives Feared as Result of Coming Havana Meeting

byline.original: By BARNARD L. COLLIER Special to The New York Times
